title: TAI "ABOUT A GIRL" font ID
content:
need help identifying the “ABOUT A GIRL” typeface. thanks,  
danny

 [‹ script problem](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040319/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46785 "Go to previous forum topic") [deutsch borse photography prize poster ID ? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040319/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46783 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
You beat me to it Jan ;)

I was thinking [Myriad SemiCondensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040319/http:/store1.adobe.com/cfusion/store/html/index.cfm?store=OLS-US&event=displayFont&code=MYRP50003000).

Condensed seems a little too narrow, SemiCondensed a little too wide. So perhaps SemiCondensed squeezed a little?
